description: The Security Manager allows you to grant access and permissions to users within your network.
When placed in your system, you'll need to create a Security Card for each player you'd like to configure permissions for. When no cards are present, everyone has access to all permissions.

To restrict permissions and access to all unconfigured players, configure a card that isn't bound to a player and put it into the manager. The person who placed the Security Manager will always have access to it.
